page.title: 15MUNCASTER MILL RAVENGLASS
page.content: Muncaster Mill is 1 mile north of Ravenglass on the A595.It is open to the public every day except Saturday from March to November.It is a working mill with an 'overshot'water wheel which uses water from the river Mite. The miller is Mr.Peter Ellis and it is owned by the Ravenglass and Eskdale Railway Co.Ltd.whose trains stop at the halt by the mill.There is a drying floor used to dry the oats and barley that were the usual crop in this area.Stoneground flour can be bought from the mill.
